name: WorkOrderLineItem
description: Represents a line item on a work order.
summary:
The `WorkOrderLineItem` object in Salesforce is designed to track detailed information about individual line items associated with a work order. This object includes various attributes that cover its identification, relationships, status, and financial details. Here's a summary of the attributes:

1. **Identification and System Information:**
   - `Id` (id): Unique identifier for the line item.
   - `IsDeleted` (boolean): Indicates if the line item is deleted.
   - `CreatedDate` (datetime): Date and time when the line item was created.
   - `CreatedById` (reference): Reference to the user who created the line item.
   - `LastModifiedDate` (datetime): Date and time when the line item was last modified.
   - `LastModifiedById` (reference): Reference to the user who last modified the line item.
   - `SystemModstamp` (datetime): System modification timestamp.

2. **Viewing and Referencing Information:**
   - `LastViewedDate` (datetime): Last date and time the line item was viewed.
   - `LastReferencedDate` (datetime): Last date and time the line item was referenced.

3. **Relationship Fields:**
   - `WorkOrderId` (reference): ID of the associated work order.
   - `ParentWorkOrderLineItemId` (reference): ID of the parent work order line item, if applicable.
   - `Product2Id` (reference): ID of the associated product.
   - `AssetId` (reference): ID of the associated asset.
   - `OrderId` (reference): ID of the associated order.
   - `RootWorkOrderLineItemId` (reference): ID of the root work order line item.
   - `PricebookEntryId` (reference): ID of the associated price book entry.
   - `WorkTypeId` (reference): ID of the associated work type.
   - `ServiceTerritoryId` (reference): ID of the associated service territory.
   - `LocationId` (reference): ID of the associated location.

4. **Descriptive and Status Information:**
   - `LineItemNumber` (string): Identifier for the line item number.
   - `Description` (textarea): Detailed description of the line item.
   - `Status` (picklist): Current status of the line item.
   - `StatusCategory` (picklist): Category of the status.
   - `IsClosed` (boolean): Indicates if the line item is closed.
   - `Priority` (picklist): Priority level of the line item.
   - `Subject` (string): Subject or title of the line item.

5. **Financial and Quantitative Information:**
   - `Quantity` (double): Quantity of the items.
   - `UnitPrice` (currency): Price per unit.
   - `Discount` (percent): Discount applied.
   - `ListPrice` (currency): Listed price.
   - `Subtotal` (currency): Subtotal amount (before taxes, discounts, etc.).
   - `TotalPrice` (currency): Total price after adjustments.

6. **Timing Information:**
   - `StartDate` (datetime): Start date and time for the line item.
   - `EndDate` (datetime): End date and time for the line item.
   - `Duration` (double): Duration of the work.
   - `DurationType` (picklist): Type of duration (e.g., hours, days).
   - `DurationInMinutes` (double): Duration in minutes.
   - `ServiceAppointmentCount` (int): Number of associated service appointments.

7. **Location and Address Information:**
   - `Street` (textarea): Street address.
   - `City` (string): City.
   - `State` (string): State.
   - `PostalCode` (string): Postal code.
   - `Country` (string): Country.
   - `Latitude` (double): Latitude coordinates.
   - `Longitude` (double): Longitude coordinates.
   - `GeocodeAccuracy` (picklist): Accuracy of the geocode.
   - `Address` (address): Complete address information.

This comprehensive set of attributes allows for detailed tracking and management of work order line items within the Salesforce platform, supporting various operational, financial, and logistical needs.
label: Work Order Line Item
